full_text: You must ALSO BRING with you what is noted below: The proceeding will take about two hours. If for any Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 If applying for NATURALIZATION AS THE SPOUSE of a United States Citizen; reason you cannot keep this appointment, return this - Your marriage certificate. letter immediately with your explanation and a request - Proof of death or divorce for each prior marriage of yourself or spouse. for a new appointment; otherwise, no further action will - Your spouse's birth or naturalization certificate or certificate of citizenship. be taken on your application. If applying for NATURALIZATION ON BEHALF OF YOUR CHILD (children); If you are applying for citizenship for yourself, you will - The child (children) for whom you filed application for naturalization. be tested on your knowledge of the government and - Birth certificate(s) for the child (children). history of the United States. You will also be tested - Adoption decree(s), and English translation(s) if in a foreign language. on reading, writing, and speaking English, unless you have been living in the United States for a total of at - Your United States birth certificate or certificate of naturalization or citizenship. least 20 years as a lawful permanent resident and are - Your marriage certificate. over 50 years old, or unless your are physically unable If applying for NATURALIZATION as member of the United States ARMED FORCES; to read, write, or speak English. - Your discharge certificate, or form DD 214. Authority for collection of the personal data information If you are also applying for a CERTIFICATE of citizenship FOR your CHILD (children); requested on the Description form is contained in Sections 332 and 338 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. - The child (children) between 14 and 18 years for whom you have applied, and for which 1442 and 1449). Submission of this information is voluntary. the fee has been paid. The principal purpose for requesting this information is to comply with the statutory requirements as to the contents of a certificate of naturalization. The information requested, PERSONAL DESCRIPTION FORM as a matter of routine use, will be furnished to the clerk of (Type or Print) the naturalization court where your petition for naturalization will be filed in order to place the information on a certificate Date of Birth 1-1-1914 Sex MALE Marital Status MARRIED of naturalization in the event you are admitted to United States citizenship. As a routine use all or any part of the information may be disclosed to a court, and to other federal, state, local or foreign law enforcement or regulatory agencies, Eye Color BLACK Hair Color BLACK-WHIP Color WHEATISH Department of Defense, including any component thereof, the Selective Service System, the Department of State, the De- partment of the Treasury, the Department of Transportation, Height (Feet & Inches) 5-7 Weight (Pounds) 136 LBS Central Intelligence Agency, Interpol and individuals and organizations in the processing of your application or peti- tion for naturalization or during the course of investigation to Visible Distinctive Marks FRASTURE ON THE LEFT ARM elicit further information required by the Immigration and Naturalization Service to carry out its function. Information requested which indicates a violation or potential violation Country of Nationality INDIAN. of law, whether civil, criminal or regulatory in nature, may be referred, as a routine use, to the appropriate agency, whether federal, state, local or foreign, charged with the responsi- bility of investigating, enforcing or prosecuting such (If change of name requested) Change to: violations. Failure to provide any or all of the requested information will prevent the issuance of a certificate of naturalization.
